content:
The Handbook
Introduction
The GitLab team handbook is the central repository for how we run the company. Printed, it consists of over
2,000 pages of text
. As part of our value of being
transparent the handbook is
open to the world
, and we welcome
feedback. Please make a
merge request
to suggest
improvements or add clarifications. Please use
issues
to
ask questions.
For a very specific set of
internal
information we also maintain an
Internal Handbook
